channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Target joins OpenAI’s growing list of retail apps
item.description: OpenAI is pushing deeper into retail, with Target set to debut a new ChatGPT-powered app for shoppers. The app is launching in beta next week.

item.title: Tout l’univers de Samsung est à prix cassé pendant le Black Friday : les 20 meilleurs deals
item.description: Pendant le pré-Black Friday, les produits Samsung sont à l'honneur. On trouve des smartphones à moitié prix, des TV à prix cassés, ou même des barres de son à petit prix : retrouvez ici les meilleures offres.

item.title: Learning With AI Falls Short Compared to Old-Fashioned Web Search
item.description: In virtually all the ways that matter, getting summarized information from AI models was less educational than doing the work of search.

item.title: The Epstein files have claimed their first OpenAI victim: board member Larry Summers
item.description: Former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers has resigned from OpenAI’s board days after Congress released documents showing he was close friends with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Vasco Translator Q1 Review: Cloning Your Voice
item.description: This new real-time interpreter can change your language while cloning your voice—sort of.

item.title: Le Porsche Cayenne devient enfin une voiture électrique, et fait mieux que la 911 Turbo S
item.description: Porsche vient d'officialiser son nouveau Cayenne Electric, un SUV électrique qui pulvérise tous les records de la marque. Il s'agit de la Porsche la plus puissante de l'histoire, mais aussi de l'une des Porsche les plus pratique pour le quotidien.

item.title: Sony Xperia 1 VII review: has Sony’s long-standing Xperia family lost what it takes to compete?
item.description: The Sony Xperia 1 VII is a capable handset that can't quite match some rivals, while coming in at a higher price.

item.title: Bose Black Friday deals are in, and my top-choice new Ultra Earbuds and headphones are heavily discounted – run!
item.description: Bose kit offers the best ANC in the business and now, the prices are truly worthy of your consideration –thanks, Black Friday!

item.title: Cette marque de vélo électrique offre (littéralement) sur un plateau son tricycle aux professionnels
item.description: Après deux ans de carrière, le tricycle électrique Cube Trike Hybrid dévoile une version Flatbed avec un plateau nu à destination des professionnels, afin de charger de grandes quantités marchandises.

item.title: Les Xiaomi Store ne sont pas là que pour faire joli, c’est une vraie stratégie qui se met en place
item.description: Xiaomi se lance dans l'ouverture de ses propres magasins physiques en France dans le cadre d'une stratégie mondiale ambitieuse visant à implanter 10 000 Xiaomi Stores d'ici 2030, pour renforcer sa présence directe et mieux faire découvrir l'ensemble de son écosystème de produits, au-delà des smartphones. La démarche vise aussi à se diversifier peu à peu....

item.title: Je suis monté à bord du Porsche Cayenne électrique, et j’ai été impressionné par ses technologies et sa puissance démentielles
item.description: Porche vient de dévoiler sa nouvelle voiture électrique, le Cayenne. Elle est plus rapide que la nouvelle 911 Turbo S et c'est même la Porsche la plus puissante de tous les temps. On a pu monter à bord pour se faire un premier avis, en statique.

item.title: Porsche Reveals Everything About Its Cayenne Electric—Except for One Vital Thing
item.description: The automaker has taken the covers off its Cayenne Electric and Cayenne Turbo Electric, the most powerful production Porsches ever. But it won’t confirm a key AI feature of its first fully electric SUV.

item.title: Porsche crowns Cayenne Electric ‘most powerful production Porsche of all time’
item.description: It’s no surprise that the Porsche Cayenne EV is a beast. Of course the famed German automaker would tout its all-electric SUV as “the most powerful,” the quickest — both off the line and in a charging stall — and record-setting in so many ways. The question remains: how beastly are we talking? Now, thankfully, […]

item.title: Adobe to acquire digital marketing platform Semrush for $1.9 billion
item.description: Adobe is acquiring the digital marketing platform Semrush for around $1.9 billion. In a press release on Wednesday, Adobe says the deal will allow it and Semrush to give marketers insight into how their brands appear across the web. The acquisition builds on Adobe’s existing suite of marketing tools that help businesses manage digital campaigns […]

item.title: How to cancel Surfshark and get a refund
item.description: Cancel auto-renewal and claim your money back - with no hassle

item.title: Cloud and AI usage is still a concern for businesses - and the worries are only set to rise
item.description: Public cloud might be favored more than on-prem, but both are just as at-risk of cyber incidents.

item.title: XRP price keeps falling as digital tokens struggle to regain ground. What’s happening with crypto?
item.description: A selloff of cryptocurrencies has continued this week, due to broader economic concerns and longtime holders seeking to lock in profits while they can. The cryptocurrency market is continuing to tumble as investors worry about risky assets, an AI and tech bubble, and a roughly 50% likelihood of the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates.

item.title: Cdiscount enchaîne les promotions avec l’arrivée du véritable Black Friday : les 17 meilleures offres
item.description: À l'approche du Black Friday, Cdiscount multiplie les bonnes affaires. Téléviseurs, ordinateurs portables, consoles de jeux et même des forfaits mobiles… De nombreux produits très recherchés profitent de belles remises.

item.title: The 15 Best Soundbars We’ve Tested in 2025: Sonos, Sony, Bose
item.description: Every television deserves a row of speakers to call its own. These are our favorite soundbars.

item.title: Security startup Guardio nabs $80M from ION Crossover Partners
item.description: Guardio is leveraging its experience building browser extensions and apps that scan for malicious and phishing sites to build a tool that looks for artifacts in code and websites made with vibe coding tools.

item.title: What is the release date for Pluribus episode 4 on Apple TV?
item.description: Episode 4 of Apple's mystery sci-fi drama arrives later this week – here's when you can watch it.

item.title: Microsoft reveals new plan to make your Windows 11 PC more stable and reliable – and help you recover from disasters
item.description: Microsoft is working on making Windows 11 more stable, though it's going to be a long road to that end goal.

item.title: These are the 15 best iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch and Apple TV apps of the 2025, according to Apple
item.description: Apple’s App Store Awards have honored the best apps of 2025 across Apple’s platforms –here are all the key winners.

item.title: OpenCV founders launch AI video startup to take on OpenAI and Google
item.description: A new artificial intelligence startup founded by the creators of the world's most widely used computer vision library has emerged from stealth with technology that generates realistic human-centric videos up to five minutes long — a dramatic leap beyond the capabilities of rivals including OpenAI's Sora and Google's Veo.CraftStory, which launched Tuesday with $2 million in funding, is introducing Model 2.0, a video generation system that addresses one of the most significant limitations plaguing the nascent AI video industry: duration. While OpenAI's Sora 2 tops out at 25 seconds and most comp...

item.title: The age of intelligent real estate
item.description: Move from manual tasks to wise decisions. Every industry eventually reaches its productivity era. Manufacturing had automation. Finance had algorithmic trading. Today, real estate is stepping into its own transformation: the age of intelligent decision making.

item.title: Test de la ROG Xbox Ally X : une bonne console portable, mais une mauvaise Xbox
item.description: L'Asus ROG Xbox Ally X est là pour relancer la catégorie des PC consoles portables. Mais hélas, son lancement n'est pas aussi simple que prévu...

item.title: Windows 11 : Microsoft va enfin corriger cette aberration du calendrier
item.description: Le système d’exploitation de Microsoft profitera prochainement d’une mise à jour qui introduira une nouveauté que plus personne n’attendait : un aperçu complet du calendrier depuis le volet des notifications.

item.title: Black Friday écouteurs, casques et enceintes : voici les 12 meilleures offres sur l’audio des marques Nothing, Apple, Sony, Bose, JBL…
item.description: Écouteurs Bluetooth, casques audio sans-fil, enceintes Bluetooth, plusieurs produits audio regroupent cette catégorie. Nous avons sélectionné les meilleures offres du secteur. Vous y trouverez des AirPods, des produits JBL ou encore des casques de chez Sony.

item.title: CIOs are being lumped with AI responsibilities - and many of them aren't happy with that
item.description: While CIOs are OK with taking on AI responsibilities, they lack sufficient support, particularly when it comes to security.

item.title: La charge sans fil serait une aberration écologique : l’équivalent d’une ville comme Nantes gaspillé
item.description: Bon, il faut qu'on parle de votre chargeur à induction. Pratique ? Indiscutablement. Écologique ? Absolument pas. Entre la perte d'énergie et la chaleur dégagée, le bilan est lourd. Si tout le monde s'y met, on gaspille littéralement l'équivalent de la production de 200 éoliennes juste pour ne pas brancher un câble.

item.title: Early Black Friday sale: Samsung’s flagship 2TB 990 Pro SSD is what creative pros need - and costs just £121
item.description: The 2TB Samsung 990 Pro SSD delivers read speeds up to 7,450MB/s, and it’s available for just £121

item.title: Le “packaging” : l’arme secrète d’Intel pour reconquérir le marché des puces et des processeurs
item.description: Dans la course aux processeurs, il n’y a pas que la finesse de gravure qui compte ! Alors qu’Intel est vent debout pour reprendre la couronne des plus petits transistors face au Taïwanais TSMC, le géant américain met en lumière un de ces atouts peu connus : sa capacité à coller les puces ensemble.

item.title: My favorite game of 2025 is half off at Target thanks to a fun-tastic early Black Friday sale
item.description: Flip 7 is the best game I've played this year, it's fun for the whole family, and target will sell it to you for 50%-off.

item.title: The 65-inch TCL QM6K QLED TV has hit its lowest-ever price on Amazon — pay under $500 ahead of Black Friday
item.description: Find the best early Black Friday TV deal. The 65-inch TCL QM6K QLED TV is on sale for $497.99 at Amazon.

item.title: Amazon n’hésite pas à vendre au rabais de nombreux produits Tech la veille du Black Friday
item.description: Amazon lance à partir de demain ses offres Black Friday, mais certaines sont déjà en lignes. Plusieurs gammes telles que les smartphones, ordinateurs portables, casques audio et consoles de jeux bénéficient actuellement de prix réduits.

item.title: Il y a -35 % sur cet excellent stabilisateur DJI pour smartphone, capable de suivre automatiquement un sujet
item.description: Le DJI Osmo Mobile 7P est un gimbal qui offre non seulement une stabilisation efficace, mais aussi un suivi de sujet précis et ultra-réactif. S'il vous intéresse, vous pourrez le trouver à 89 euros au lieu de 139,99 euros sur Amazon, pendant le Black Friday.

item.title: Sketch. AI Prompt. Runway.
item.description: How I Designed a Fashion Show with AI. When I was a kid, my favorite place in the world was hunched over a sewing machine. I’d cut up old jeans, hand-stitch fabric scraps into new outfits, and dream of someday seeing my clothes walk a runway. My notebooks were full of fashion drawings. Somewhere in my teens, that dream slipped quietly into the background. Life pulled me in a different direction. ...

item.title: Europe’s cookie nightmare is crumbling
item.description: The EU’s cookie consent policies have been an annoying and unavoidable part of browsing the web in Europe since their introduction in 2018. But the cookie nightmare is about to crumble thanks to some big proposed changes announced by the European Commission today. Instead of having to click accept or reject on a cookie pop-up […]

item.title: Netflix hasn’t confirmed Virgin River season 7's rumored release date, but there’s an obvious reason why it makes perfect sense
item.description: We knew Virgin River season 7 would be getting a 2026 release, but we shouldn't be surprised by the release window leak.

item.title: Modération, transparence : Amazon devra jouer selon les règles européennes
item.description: Amazon a perdu son pari face à la justice européenne. Le géant américain du commerce en ligne est donc bien considéré comme une « très grande plateforme en ligne » aux yeux du règlement sur les services numériques (DSA).

item.title: Target’s bad year continues: Sales decline and stock slips as high-stakes holiday shopping season arrives
item.description: The retail giant, still struggling to regain ground after customers opposed its rollback of DEI policies, just reported another lackluster quarter. Today, retail giant Target Corporation (NYSE: TGT) reported its third-quarter fiscal 2025 earnings. Unfortunately, for the company and its investors, the results were a continuation of what Target has been seeing for years now: declining sales. ...

item.title: Sony's fantastic WH-1000XM6 headphones just got their first-ever UK price cut – beat the Black Friday rush
item.description: Get £50 off Sony's range-topping noise-cancelling over-ear headphones

item.title: J’ai désinstallé PairDrop et lâché AirDrop : LocalSend est la seule vraie solution universelle pour transférer des fichiers
item.description: Vous avez un Mac et un smartphone Android ? Ou un PC Windows et un iPad ? Alors vous connaissez l'enfer du transfert de fichiers. On m'a souvent parlé de PairDrop, la solution web. C'est mignon, ça dépanne. Mais la vraie solution industrielle, celle qui ne compresse pas vos fichiers et respecte votre vie privée, c'est LocalSend.

item.title: TikTok is letting users control how much AI content they see
item.description: TikTok is testing a new control that will let users manage how much AI-generated content appears in their video feed on the app. To help make the filter more effective, the app will also soon start adding invisible watermarks to AI content. The new AI slider will appear along with TikTok’s other content controls under […]

item.title: Black Friday Garmin watch deals are officially live – including best-ever discounts on this 'perfect' Fenix 8 smartwatch
item.description: Why wait for Black Friday? These Garmin watch deals have already started.

item.title: Want a Ring doorbell but don't want the subscription? Check out this great half-price alternative instead
item.description: There's no need to buy a subscription plan when the Eufy Video Doorbell dual captures crisp footage from its twin cameras and saves it locally on an SD card.

item.title: Comment Xiaomi va « préparer l’arrivée du véhicule électrique » en France
item.description: Xiaomi France confirme que les Xiaomi Stores qui reviennent en France servent, entre autres, à préparer l'arrivée des voitures électriques de la marque. On commence par la SU7 ou le YU7 ?

item.title: James Gunn Says Another Hero Isn’t Showing Up for ‘Man of Tomorrow’
item.description: Plus, 'Twisted Metal' is back for round 3.

item.title: Thrustmaster ESWAP X2 H.E. Controller Review
item.description: Harder, better, faster, modular. This truly amazing pro-tier controller can be finessed to do just about anything. But it will cost you.

item.title: Screw it, I’m installing Linux
item.description: This time I'm really going to do it. I am going to put Linux on my gaming PC. Calling it now. 2026 is the year of Linux on the desktop. Or at least on mine. Linux has been a perfectly viable desktop OS for ages. But gaming on Linux is now viable, too. Valve's hard […]

item.title: Credit risk automation platform Kaaj raises $3.8M seed from Kindred Ventures
item.description: Kaaj announced on Wednesday a $3.8 million seed round from Kindred Ventures and Better Tomorrow Ventures.

item.title: I tested Caira, the first Nano Banana AI camera – now I’m cancelling my Lightroom subscription
item.description: The Caira claims to fuse proper camera engineering with Google’s new ‘Nano Banana’ AI. It mostly succeeds, but also makes you wonder if you’ve just been replaced by your own camera.

item.title: The classroom lab I still remember
item.description: A physics lesson and a blueprint for teaching. Across nearly four decades as a teacher, principal, superintendent, funder, and now leader of a large education nonprofit organization, the experience that most shaped my view of learning wasn’t a grand reform or a shiny new program. It was a Friday physics lab in Brooklyn. My students predicted a graph that couldn’t exist—a vertical line for velocity and time. What followed was confusion, debate, trial, and error. And then discovery: Velocity requires both displacement and time. That brief struggle taught me, the teacher at the time, more about h...

item.title: Gen Z daters want deeper connections, but some use AI to date, Hinge reports
item.description: Hinge's latest report states there's a communication gap, especially between straight men and women.

item.title: Vie numérique | Mot de passe : « admin » ou « 123456 »
item.description: Les habitudes en matière de cybersécurité stagnent au Canada. Malgré les mises en garde récurrentes, une majorité de Canadiens néglige toujours les mesures les plus élémentaires de protection de leur vie numérique. C’est ce que révèle l’édition 2025 d’un sondage annuel effectué par la firme de cybersécurité NordPass.

item.title: Quel casque choisir pour votre Nintendo Switch 2 en 2025 ?
item.description: En tant que console de jeux hybride, la Nintendo Switch profitera fortement d'un casque ou d'écouteurs si vous jouez en mode portable.

item.title: Le secret de polichinelle n’est plus : voici le nom rigolo d’Android 17
item.description: Un indice contenu dans du code d'Android Canary nous confirme quel sera vraisemblablement le nom de code d'Android 17. Une nouvelle fois, il est très sucré et rigolo, dans la plus pure tradition de Google en la matière.

item.title: I’ve spent hundreds of hours ranking the best Switch 2 games, and many of them are now on sale as part of early Black Friday sales
item.description: These best Switch 2 games are on sale for Black Friday. Here's the best deals on games like Split Fiction, NBA 2K26, and more.

item.title: At this Black Friday price, this is the cheapest phone I would actually recommend buying
item.description: The CMF Phone 2 is the cheapest handset I’d actually recommend, and it’s even cheaper with this early Black Friday deal.

item.title: Europe is scaling back its landmark privacy and AI laws
item.description: After years of staring down the world’s biggest tech companies and setting the bar for tough regulation worldwide, Europe has blinked. Under intense pressure from industry and the US government, Brussels is stripping protections from its flagship General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) — including simplifying its infamous cookie permission pop-ups — and relaxing or delaying landmark […]...
